item.description: Movement (dance, acrobatics, yoga-like practices) Energy of live performance (theatre actors, DJs, dancers) Playground spaces in community and for accessibillity
From Elise Co (Beyond Pixels) “Computers are not there to create ambience; we want them to perform tasks and relay data, so they (usually) cannot be formless blobs with indecipherable pulsation.

item.title: Inspiration for graphics programming
item.description: Learning the low-level relationships between math and visualizations…It is a different way of seeing the patterns that exist.

item.title: Sensory spaces
item.description: Can we make these virtual spaces and let them be a home? To travel between. Through the portal of the web, a simple way anyone can access.
